parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Forces drawing of cinema borders when using custom camera [[camCreate]]. This is normally used in cutscenes to indicate player has no control.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''showCinemaBorder''' show

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  show: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[showCinemaBorder]] [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[showHUD]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 13 October 2007 - 15:20 (CEST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Crowe|Crowe]]</dt>
<dd class="note">This command does only work when Mission is started. Use [[waitUntil]] {[[time]] > 0}; to be sure it works.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
